member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarAnimation.Expression
member.summary: Gets the expression of the related animation at the current time position.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarAnimation.Finalize
member.summary: Allows the avatar animation to attempt to free resources, and it performs other cleanup operations before garbage collection reclaims the animation.

member.summary: Gets the disposed state of the avatar animation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarAnimation.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of the current animation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarAnimation.Update(System.TimeSpan,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the current time position of the avatar animation.
member.param: Elapsed time since the last animation frame. This value can be either a positive or negative time span. If the value is negative, animation playback is reversed.
true if the animation playback is to be looped; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Female, shifting weight from one foot to another

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarAnimationPreset.MaleIdleShiftWeight
member.summary: Male, shifting weight from one foot to another.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription
member.summary: Provides access to the methods and properties of the description data for an avatar.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of AvatarDescription using an existing data buffer.
member.param: Existing buffer used to store the information of the newly-created avatar. Use the buffer specified by the Description property of a valid AvatarDescription object. Common scenarios include the recreation of random avatars that were created earlier or when avatar decription data is sent over a network to all signed-in gamers. Once that data is received, local avatar descriptions and renderers are created for each remote gamer avatar. Results are undefined if buffers from other sources are used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription.BeginGetFromGamer(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.Gamer,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins the process of getting a AvatarDescription object for a specified gamertag.
member.param: Gamer to request the AvatarDescription for.
The method to be called once the asynchronous operation has finished.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription.BodyType
member.summary: Gets the body type of the avatar based on the description data.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription.Changed
member.summary: Occurs when a gamer's avatar changes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription.CreateRandom
member.summary: Creates an avatar of random gender, features, and clothing.

member.summary: Creates an avatar of the specified body type with random features and clothing.
member.param: Body type of the randomly-created avatar.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription.Description
member.summary: Internal description buffer of the avatar, stored as a byte buffer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.AvatarDescription.EndGetFromGamer(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends the process of getting an AvatarDescription object for a specified gamertag.
member.param: An IAsyncResult used to track the progress of the operation.
